# impress.js^*

--- #its x:850 y:3000 rot:45 scale:5

 It's a **presentation tool** <br/>
inspired by the idea behind [prezi.com](http://prezi.com) <br/>
and based on the **power of CSS3 transforms and transitions** in modern browsers.

--- #big x:3500 y:2100 rot:180 scale:6

visualize your <b>big</b> <span class="thoughts">thoughts</span>

--- #tiny x:2825 y:2325 z:-3000 rot:300 scale:1

and **tiny** ideas

--- #ing x:3500 y:-850 rot:270 scale:6
by <b class="positioning">positioning</b>, <b class="rotating">rotating</b> and <b class="scaling">scaling</b> them on an infinite canvas

--- #imagination x:6700 y:-300 scale:6

the only **limit** is your <b class="imagination">imagination</b>

Let's start easy. Here's a simple multibar chart

 <style>
  .rChart {
    display: block;
    margin-left: auto; 
    margin-right: auto;
    width: 900px;
    height: 600px;
  }  
  </style>
<div id = 'chart10855c231359' class = 'rChart nvd3'></div>
<script type='text/javascript'>
 $(document).ready(function(){
      drawchart10855c231359()
    });
    function drawchart10855c231359(){  
      var opts = {
 "dom": "chart10855c231359",
"width":    900,
"height":    600,
"x": "Hair",
"y": "Freq",
"group": "Eye",
"type": "multiBarChart",
"id": "chart10855c231359" 
},
        data = [
 {
 "Hair": "Black",
"Eye": "Brown",
"Sex": "Male",
"Freq":             32 
},
{
 "Hair": "Brown",
"Eye": "Brown",
"Sex": "Male",
"Freq":             53 
},
{
 "Hair": "Red",
"Eye": "Brown",
"Sex": "Male",
"Freq":             10 
},
{
 "Hair": "Blond",
"Eye": "Brown",
"Sex": "Male",
"Freq":              3 
},
{
 "Hair": "Black",
"Eye": "Blue",
"Sex": "Male",
"Freq":             11 
},
{
 "Hair": "Brown",
"Eye": "Blue",
"Sex": "Male",
"Freq":             50 
},
{
 "Hair": "Red",
"Eye": "Blue",
"Sex": "Male",
"Freq":             10 
},
{
 "Hair": "Blond",
"Eye": "Blue",
"Sex": "Male",
"Freq":             30 
},
{
 "Hair": "Black",
"Eye": "Hazel",
"Sex": "Male",
"Freq":             10 
},
{
 "Hair": "Brown",
"Eye": "Hazel",
"Sex": "Male",
"Freq":             25 
},
{
 "Hair": "Red",
"Eye": "Hazel",
"Sex": "Male",
"Freq":              7 
},
{
 "Hair": "Blond",
"Eye": "Hazel",
"Sex": "Male",
"Freq":              5 
},
{
 "Hair": "Black",
"Eye": "Green",
"Sex": "Male",
"Freq":              3 
},
{
 "Hair": "Brown",
"Eye": "Green",
"Sex": "Male",
"Freq":             15 
},
{
 "Hair": "Red",
"Eye": "Green",
"Sex": "Male",
"Freq":              7 
},
{
 "Hair": "Blond",
"Eye": "Green",
"Sex": "Male",
"Freq":              8 
} 
]
  
      if(!(opts.type==="pieChart" || opts.type==="sparklinePlus" || opts.type==="bulletChart")) {
        var data = d3.nest()
          .key(function(d){
            //return opts.group === undefined ? 'main' : d[opts.group]
            //instead of main would think a better default is opts.x
            return opts.group === undefined ? opts.y : d[opts.group];
          })
          .entries(data);
      }
      
      if (opts.disabled != undefined){
        data.map(function(d, i){
          d.disabled = opts.disabled[i]
        })
      }
      
      nv.addGraph(function() {
        var chart = nv.models[opts.type]()
          .width(opts.width)
          .height(opts.height)
          
        if (opts.type != "bulletChart"){
          chart
            .x(function(d) { return d[opts.x] })
            .y(function(d) { return d[opts.y] })
        }
          
         
        
          
        

        
        
        
      
       d3.select("#" + opts.id)
        .append('svg')
        .datum(data)
        .transition().duration(500)
        .call(chart);

       nv.utils.windowResize(chart.update);
       return chart;
      });
    };
</script>

      if(!(opts.type==="pieChart" || opts.type==="sparklinePlus" || opts.type==="bulletChart")) {
        var data = d3.nest()
          .key(function(d){
            //return opts.group === undefined ? 'main' : d[opts.group]
            //instead of main would think a better default is opts.x
            return opts.group === undefined ? opts.y : d[opts.group];
          })
          .entries(data);
      }
      
      if (opts.disabled != undefined){
        data.map(function(d, i){
          d.disabled = opts.disabled[i]
        })
      }
      
      nv.addGraph(function() {
        var chart = nv.models[opts.type]()
          .width(opts.width)
          .height(opts.height)
          
        if (opts.type != "bulletChart"){
          chart
            .x(function(d) { return d[opts.x] })
            .y(function(d) { return d[opts.y] })
        }
          
         
        
          
        

        chart.x2Axis
  .tickFormat(function(d) {return d3.time.format('%Y')(new Date( d * 86400000 ));})
        
        
      
       d3.select("#" + opts.id)
        .append('svg')
        .datum(data)
        .transition().duration(500)
        .call(chart);

       nv.utils.windowResize(chart.update);
       return chart;
      });

A different flavour?
<link rel='stylesheet' href=data:text/css;base64,>
<link rel='stylesheet' href=data:text/css;base64,Lm52ZDMgewogICAgZGlzcGxheTogYmxvY2s7CiAgICBtYXJnaW4tbGVmdDogYXV0bzsKICAgIG1hcmdpbi1yaWdodDogYXV0bzsKICAgIHdpZHRoOiA4MDBweDsKICAgIGhlaWdodDogNDAwcHg7CiAgICAvKiBiYWNrZ3JvdW5kOiAjZWVlOyAqLwp9ICAK>
<script type='text/javascript' src=data:application/javascript;base64,></script>
<script type='text/javascript' src=data:application/javascript;base64,></script>
<script type='text/javascript' src=data:application/javascript;base64,></script>
<script type='text/javascript' src=data:application/javascript;base64,></script> 
 <style>
  .rChart {
    display: block;
    margin-left: auto; 
    margin-right: auto;
    width: 900px;
    height: 600px;
  }  
  </style>
<div id = 'chart10851d242532' class = 'rChart nvd3'></div>
<script type='text/javascript'>
 $(document).ready(function(){
      drawchart10851d242532()
    });
    function drawchart10851d242532(){  
      var opts = {
 "dom": "chart10851d242532",
"width":    900,
"height":    600,
"x": "cyl",
"y": "freq",
"type": "pieChart",
"id": "chart10851d242532" 
},
        data = [
 {
 "cyl":              4,
"freq": 11 
},
{
 "cyl":              6,
"freq": 7 
},
{
 "cyl":              8,
"freq": 14 
} 
]
  
      if(!(opts.type==="pieChart" || opts.type==="sparklinePlus" || opts.type==="bulletChart")) {
        var data = d3.nest()
          .key(function(d){
            //return opts.group === undefined ? 'main' : d[opts.group]
            //instead of main would think a better default is opts.x
            return opts.group === undefined ? opts.y : d[opts.group];
          })
          .entries(data);
      }
      
      if (opts.disabled != undefined){
        data.map(function(d, i){
          d.disabled = opts.disabled[i]
        })
      }
      
      nv.addGraph(function() {
        var chart = nv.models[opts.type]()
          .width(opts.width)
          .height(opts.height)
          
        if (opts.type != "bulletChart"){
          chart
            .x(function(d) { return d[opts.x] })
            .y(function(d) { return d[opts.y] })
        }
          
         
        
          
        

        
        
        
      
       d3.select("#" + opts.id)
        .append('svg')
        .datum(data)
        .transition().duration(500)
        .call(chart);

       nv.utils.windowResize(chart.update);
       return chart;
      });
    };
</script>
